Acidic Poison I.description: Deal [11+2D] physical damage to the target. This damage always has the [Blight] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.

Acidic Poison II.description: Deal [26+2D] physical damage to the target. This damage always has the [Blight] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.

Adroit Hand Card I.description: The next time the target performs a [Prop Disable], they gain a +1D bonus to the check. The effect of multiple Adroit Hand Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene. (CR9): This item has no effect.

Adroit Hand Card II.description: The next time the target performs a [Prop Disable], they gain a +1D bonus to the check. The effect of multiple Adroit Hand Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene. (CR16): This item has no effect.

Antidote I.description: The target removes a [Decay] condition with a rating of 20 or less.

Backpack.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots by +5.

Bag of Holding.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots by +6. This is often referred to as Tohra's Magic Bag.

Barrier Jewel I.description: Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains [Barrier: 15].

Basket.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots by +3.

Bottle of Magic Potency I.description: The target's [Magic Power] gains a +2 bonus. Treat this as a Combat Status. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Bottle of Mighty Strikes I.description: The target's [Attack Power] gains a +2 bonus. Treat this as a Combat Status. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Curse Poison I.description: Deal [2+2D] magical damage to the target. This damage always has the [Blight] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.

Curse Poison II.description: Deal [17+2D] magical damage to the target. This damage always has the [Blight] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.

Dark Vision Potion I.description: You gain the [Dark Vision] tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Deadly Poison I.description: This item only has an effect if the target is a [Mob] enemy. The target becomes [Incapacitated] or [Dead] (your choice).

Deadly Poison II.description: This item only has an effect if the target is a [Mob] enemy. The target becomes [Incapacitated] or [Dead] (your choice).

Dodge Salve I.description: The target gains a +1 bonus to [Evasion]. (CR14): This item has no effect.

Eagle Card I.description: During this Main Process, the target gains [Flying]. (CR18): This item has no effect.

Elemental Card I.description: Select one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit]. During the target's Main Process, they deal damage of the chosen tag. (CR11) This item has no effect.

Enduring Magic Salve.description: The target gains a +4 bonus to [Magic Defense].

Explorer's Scroll I.description: Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Spirit]. The target takes no damage with the chosen tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR12): This item has no effect.

Failed Cuisine.description: The target's [Fatigue] rating decreases by -2. Any number of this item can be stored in a single Item Slot. This food has no taste and is unappealing.

Fish Scales Gemstone I.description: Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains the [Aquatic] tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (Fate 1): You can use this item with [Target: Wide 2 (P)]. (CR12): This item has no effect.

Focus Card I.description: During the target's Main Process, the target's [Normal Moves] become [Safe Moves]. (CR16): This item has no effect.

Food Bag.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots for [Food] items only by +12.

Glimpse Scroll I.description: This scroll targets the next scene. Compare your check result against the [Identification Difficulty] of each enemy appearing in the next scene. For each success, you learn the name and appearance of that enemy. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (Fumble): The enemy notices your scouting.

Glimpse Scroll II.description: This scroll targets the next scene. Compare your check result against the [Identification Difficulty] of each enemy appearing in the next scene. For each success, you learn the name and appearance of that enemy. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (Fumble): The enemy notices your scouting.

Healing Card I.description: During the current Main Process, the target gains a +10 bonus to [Recovery]. The effect of multiple Healing Cards (regardless of grade) do not stack.

Hex Card I.description: During this Main Process, the target gains a +2D bonus to [Magic Attack] damage rolls. The effect of multiple Hex Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack.

Holy Water I.description: Deal [1D] penetrating damage to the target. This damage always has the [Holy] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.

Holy Water II.description: Deal [3+1D] penetrating damage to the target. This damage always has the [Holy] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.

Iron Body Salve I.description: The target gains a +4 bonus to [Physical Defense].

Iron Gut Card I.description: The next time the target would take damage, reduce the damage by -5. The effect of multiple Iron Gut Cards (regardless of grade) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at teh end of the scene.

Jewel of Rebirth I.description: Increase your Hate by +2. The target removes the [Incapacitated] condition, and recovers [Target's CR] HP. (Fate 1): This item's Hate cost is reduced to 0. (CR11): This item has no effect.

Jewel of the Firefly.description: Increases your Hate by +1. All [Dim Light] [Night] and [Darkness] effects within range are negated. This effect ends when the scene does. (Fate 1): This item's Hate cost is reduced to 0.

Jewel of the Swift Horse I.description: Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains a +1 bonus to [Speed]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status that lasts until the end of the round. (Fate 1): This effect lasts until the end of the scene instead. (CR18): This item has no effect.

Life-Calling Jewel I.description: Increase your Hate by +1. This jewel only produces an effect when the target is of the Healer Archetype. The target removes the [Incapacitated] condition and recovers [Target's CR] HP. (Fate 1): This item's Hate cost is reduced to 0. (CR11): This item has no effect.

Lunch Box.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots for [Food] items only by +3.

Magical Card I.description: During the target's Main Process, physical damage they deal changes to magical damage. (CR15): This item has no effect.

Mass Enchant Scroll I.description: Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Holy] [Blight] or [Spirit]. The target's [Weapon Attack] deal magical damage of the chosen tag type. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR18): This item has no effect.

Mass Protect Scroll I.description: Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Holy] [Blight] or [Spirit]. The target gains [Cancel (Chosen Tag): 5]. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR16): This item has no effect.

Mass Stealth Scroll I.description: When the target appears in the next scene, they will have the [Hidden] status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR18): This item has no effect.

Mini-Pouch.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots by +2.

Mystic Wing Gemstone I.description: Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains [Flight]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Panacea I.description: The target removes any two Bad Statuses currently affecting them. (CR11): This item has no effect.

Physical Card I.description: During the target's Main Process, magical damage they deal changes to physical damage. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Potion Holder I.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots for [Medicine] and [Toxin] items only by +4.

Pouch.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots by +3.

Pure Eye Card I.description: The next time the target performs [Prop Analyze], they gain a +1D bonus to the check. The effect of multiple Pure Eye Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene. (CR9): This item has no effect.

Pure Eye Card II.description: The next time the target performs [Prop Analyze], they gain a +1D bonus to the check. The effect of multiple Pure Eye Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene. (CR16): This item has no effect.

Quick Card I.description: During the target's current Main Process, the target receives an extra minor action. The effect of multiple Quick Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack. (CR17): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Acceleration I.description: The target gains a +4 bonus to [Initiative]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Clairvoyance I.description: This scroll targets the next scene. You learn the name, rank, and tags of every Prop with [Detection Difficulty: Automatic] in that scene. As a cost, you take [Fatigue: Base STR], for using this scroll. (CR11): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Enchanting I.description: Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Holy] [Blight] [Spirit]. The target's [Weapon Attack] deal magical damage of the chosen tag type. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Flight I.description: The target gains [Flying]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR14): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Light I.description: All [Dim Light] [Night] and [Darkness] effects within range are negated. This effect ends when the scene does. You take [Fatigue: Base STR].

Scroll of Mass Flight I.description: The target gains [Flying]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR18): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Protection I.description: Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Holy] [Blight] or [Spirit]. The target gains [Cancel (Chosen Tag)]. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR15): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Scrying I.description: You can target any enemy appearing in the next scene that you know the name of with [Enemy Identification]. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR11): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Sight I.description: The target recognizes and may act against characters with the [Hidden] effect as if they did not have that effect (however, this effect does not remove the [Hidden] condition from the character). Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR].

Scroll of Stealth I.description: When the target appears in the next scene, they will have the [Hidden] status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR16): This item has no effect.

Scroll of Sweeping I.description: This scroll only produces an effect against [Mob] enemies. The target is [Incapacitated] or [Dead] (your choice). As a cost, you take [Fatigue: Base STR] for using this scroll.

Scroll of Sweeping II.description: This scroll only produces an effect against [Mob] enemies. The target is [Incapacitated] or [Dead] (your choice). As a cost, you take [Fatigue: Base STR] for using this scroll.

Scroll of the Fish I.description: The target gains the [Aquatic] tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR14): This item has no effect.

Scroll of the Pure Eye I.description: The target treats all Props with the [Magic] tag as if they had [Detection Difficulty: Automatic]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR15): This item has no effect.

Sealing Poison I.description: The target is unable to inflict Bad Statuses with its actions. Treat this effect as a Bad Status that is removed at the end of the target's next Main Process.

Sealing Poison II.description: The target is unable to inflict Bad Statuses with its actions. Treat this effect as a Bad Status that is removed at the end of the target's next Main Process.

Skill Potion I.description: When you acquire this potion, select one: Athletics, Endurance, Disable, Operate, Perception, Negotiation, Analysis, Knowledge, and record this item as Skill Potion I: (Chosen Skill). The target gains a +1 bonus to the chosen skill. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (CR10): This item has no effect.

Skill Potion II.description: When you acquire this potion, select one: Athletics, Endurance, Disable, Operate, Perception, Negotiation, Analysis, Knowledge, and record this item as Skill Potion II: (Chosen Skill). The target gains a +1 bonus to the chosen skill. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (CR17): This item has no effect.

Slash Card I.description: During this Main Process, the target gains a +2D bonus to [Weapon Attack] damage rolls. The effect of multiple Slash Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack.

Tote Bag.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots by +4.

True Sight Card I.description: This item targets everything in range that has a [Detection Difficulty]. The target removes [Concealed] or [Hidden]. You do not have to apply this effect to your allies.

Warding Salve I.description: The target gains a +1 bonus to [Resistance]. (CR14): This item has no effect.

Water Breathing Potion I.description: You gain the [Aquatic] tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (CR13): This item has no effect.

Waterproof Bag.description: Increase your number of Inventory Slots by +2. Items inside the bag cannot be the target of effects that would normally cause items to vanish.

White Construct I.description: When the target next applies a [Barrier], increase the rating of that [Barrier] by +2D. The effect of multiple White Constructs (regardless of rank) do not stack, and this effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene.
